meanings.definition: The quality or state of being musky.
meanings.sent1: The muskinesses of the room reminded me of a forest.
meanings.sent2: I love the muskinesses of old books.
meanings.sent3: The muskinesses of the cheese made it taste unique.
meanings.sent4: The muskinesses of nostalgia filled the air.
meanings.sent5: The muskinesses of the perfume lingered long after she left.

meanings.definition: The characteristic smell or odor of musk.
meanings.sent1: The muskinesses of the cologne were overpowering.
meanings.sent2: She recognized the muskinesses of the deer nearby.
meanings.sent3: The muskinesses of the room made her sneeze.
meanings.sent4: The muskinesses of the forest enveloped him.
meanings.sent5: The muskinesses of the incense calmed her mind.

meanings.sent1: The muskinesses of the soil after rain is refreshing.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the muskinesses of the forest floor.
meanings.sent3: The muskinesses of the candle brought back memories.
meanings.sent4: The muskinesses of the air hinted at approaching storms.
meanings.sent5: The muskinesses of the room made it cozy and inviting.
